 2010-15122010-12-02,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  CPC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Mail Receptacles Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MAIL RECEPTACLES REGULATIONS to 1) enhance the security of the mail being delivered to apartment buildings and rural mail boxes, given the growing threat of identify theft and fraud; and 2 ) to help ensure the health and safety of delivery employees.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0288 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
